page.title: 01 SUMMARY PAGE
page.content: In the pages of text we have tried to represent our "block" as a developing area of the Midlands and at the same time to illustrate some of Cannock's more traditional features. After looking at two aspects of local history,the Church and the Conduit pump,we then turned our attention to some of Cannock's amenities. Firstly,we were concerned with recreational facilities,focusing on Cannock's new theatre and leisure amenities. Secondly,we considered Cannock's industrial development and new housing schemes. Finally we looked at the provision of communication through the media. To round off the text we took a look at Cannock's landscape and listed buildngs.
